CustomField.formula: if( AND( ISPICKVAL($User.LanguageLocaleKey, "ja") , NOT( ISBLANK(BillingCountry )) ) , BillingCountry & br(), "" ) & if(ISBLANK(BillingStreet), "" , BillingStreet & ", ") & if(ISBLANK(braseg_numero_logradouro__c), "" , braseg_numero_logradouro__c & ", ") & if(ISBLANK(braseg_complemento__c), "" , braseg_complemento__c & ", ") & if(ISBLANK(braseg_Bairro__c), "" , braseg_Bairro__c & br()) & if(ISBLANK(BillingCity), "" , BillingCity& ", ")& if(ISBLANK(BillingState), "" , BillingState& " ")& if(ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode), "" , BillingPostalCode & br()) & if( OR( ISPICKVAL($User.LanguageLocaleKey, "ja") , ISBLANK(BillingCountry) ) , "" , BillingCountry )
CustomField.label: Endere√ßo
